website_summaries.verdict: Well designed laptop sleeve with little extras that add just the right amount luxury and convenience.
pros: Zipper is over the center of the laptop, leaving the edges with more protection
Slim and sleek even with an extra storage pocket
cons: Storage pocket can hold cords but may be too shallow for much more

customer_reviews.title: This sleeve fits my Apple Macbook (A1707) Touchbar 2017.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve fits my Apple Macbook (A1707) Touchbar 2017. I searched for hours and read the reviews and this was the best. I was not disappointed when I received this sleeve. This Tomtoc sleeve has protective corners and sides around the entire sleeve. The zippered outside pocket is roomy and will fit a iPad. The padding is raised top and bottom with firm circles of padding. The zipper runs down the long side of the laptop and opens very wide. You don't have to worry about scratches as you lay the laptop into the padding. I want to thank everyone that took the time to write a review, this was extremely helpful. Contact me if you need additional information.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Corner Armor Protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my MacBook when using in a leather bag that had minimal bottom padding. The main reason I chose this was the advertised “corner armor” protection with "rubber material". I was very disappointed to see that the bottom has actually the thinnest padding out of all the surrounding edges with absolutely zero special corner protection and no armor or rubber material. On the inside, there is no insert as described by the Q&A and other reviews. Not sure if mine’s was just missing or they no longer come with it. If you want this specifically for bottom protection, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: looks and feels amazing. But wanted to return it since it was a little tight to put my MacBook Pro in and out over and over again. Reached out to return the product and was replied with “I should gift it to someone else and that you will be charged a restock fee. You should buy a new one”. Will not recommend to anyone due to customer service so make sure you love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Karrissa Galvan

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE TO BUY. NO NEED TO COMPARE OTHERS, READ REVIEWS, VIEW RANKINGS. ORDER THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.text: No need to check more reviews, compare rankings—buy this one. The quality is far superior, than other laptop sleeves. The best part is the design. Unlike traditional sleeves, this has a "cigar box" type enclosure (one side holds the laptop, the other side seals. It fits my 15" 2014 Pro like a glove, with out with a hard shell on the laptop. I also bought the 13" model, for my MacBook Air. Side note: I noticed that mine appeared to be returned/refurbished (Amazon's increasing M.O.), so I contacted tomtoc. They instantly replied, and shipped a replacement in two days.
customer_reviews.author: objectspinach

customer_reviews.title: The best sleeve and protection for your MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve is awesome! The colors are very appealing. The design of the bag is perfect for traveling or protecting your laptop. The padding inside will keep your MacBook protected and free of scratches. In addition, the bag does not have an odor of any sort, which some sleeves do. The bag is very protective and durable. The sleeve’s quality and material are very good. I believe that the bag would protect the laptop from drops or water coming into contact with the sleeve due to the protective padding inside the sleeve. I also love the extra zippered pocket, which is perfect to place a charger or hard drive to have all components of the MacBook Pro with you.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 15-inch Mac Pro 2015 user, and It fits perfectly! Pro - It really protects mac book really well. - Zipper does not scratch mac book. - Accessory Pocket is bigger than I expected. - It was shipped very clean condition Con - I purchased Mint blue, It is not very easy to remove a stain. * I did not spill water on it, do not know about waterproof. I highly recommended this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Lee

customer_reviews.title: ThinkPad X1 Extreme fits in the 15.6 Inch version
customer_reviews.text: First: My Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Extreme fits in the 15.6 Inch version of this thing. There is about an inch (or less) additional width, so there is the possibility of some slight movement (side-to-side), but it is insignificant and not a problem in my opinion. Second: It seems well made, but there was one loose thread, so it's not perfect. But again, this is insignificant and not a problem in my opinion. I think this is a good value. I think it's a good solution. I have no way to judge the water resistance of this product at this point. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Loudmouth

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, fits my MacBook Pro 16 inch AND iPad Pro 11 inch (outside pocket)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the new MacBook Pro 16 inch. Like advertised it is designed to protect 360 degrees and even the corners are well padded. It fits my MacBook Pro perfectly and it is really well made. Not too tight, and not too loose. Outside pocket can hold iPad Pro 11 inch without any issues too. I love how simple it is but provides pretty good protection. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality sleeve for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sleeve for my new work MacBook Pro because my messenger bag really did have much protection. I looked around and read lots of reviews (including the WC) and settled on this tomtoc. I am glad I did. It's been a great sleeve so far, very happy with the protective qualities of it. It fits my 15" MBP w/Touchbar like a glove. Has a good amount of padding without being obnoxiously bulky. I feel like it'll definitely protect my laptop if my bag were to take a tumble for some reason, which is exactly why I wanted it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BAG FOR MBP 16in
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and i just got it! I tested the water resistance and the water just beads off the materials It looks very durable with great material for the sleeve itself and the zippers. I was having trouble finding a bag that fit the new MBP 16in. I found that a lot of bags that I ordered were too big or too tight. This bag was the perfect size for the new MBP 16in. The computer fit so well and it was not to big or too small and the lining inside is microfiber!!! There’s even cushion on the sides to protect impact if dropped. Overall a great product and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 15 inch Mac
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, so I gave it 2 stars. I wish it actually fit the product I bought it for and which it claims to fit. It is literally about 1mm to small but the rounded edges will not fit over a Mac without an epic struggle. If you are interested in spending 5 minutes to wrestle a computer into a sleeve, maybe this is great. But if your intent is to simply slide your Mac into the case and move on, that doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur L. Matthews II

customer_reviews.title: Fits Thinkpad T490
customer_reviews.text: The 15" tomtoc 360 fits the Thinkpad T490 (14"). I assume all T4XX models would fit. There is aproximately 0.5" of wiggle room on the top and side when the laptop is pushed into the bottom corner. The sleeve has a about 3/16" of padding to protect the laptop lid and bottom. The bottom corners (non-zipper side) have a firmer shell inside of the padding. The top corners (zipper side) do not have the extra corner protection. The zipper has padding on both sides that meet when zipped. The zipper does not touch the laptop and is unlikely to scratch the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: N. IGL

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the inside was going to have more of a bumper to protect the computer as it shows in pictures but it doesn't. It still has bumpers, just not as large as I thought they would be. The inside material is super soft & the padding is really nice too. The pocket in the front is nice & large for accessories & plugs. I love the color & pattern of the bag too, it's very nice. I highly recommend this bag (even though the bumpers are smaller than pictured), it's extremely nice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Use Caution When Picking the Correct Size
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sleeve appears to be good. I like the additional cushioning on the inside of the sleeve. Unfortunately, our laptop will NOT fit into the case. I would suggest you look closely at the dimensions of the sleeve and compare to your laptop dimensions. We have ordered many cases and sleeves over the years with no issues until ordering this sleeve. For that reason I could not rate the unit above 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Busby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and padded protection!
customer_reviews.text: My 2019 MacBook Pro 15.4” with touch-bar fits perfectly inside this efficiently protective case! I do have a thin snap on case on my computer and it still fits with little room on the sides so it does not slide around. I can fit my MacBook Pro, generation 4 iPad, and charger inside comfortably. See photos. I put my computer in my bag, and it feels protected now in this tomtoc 360* case! Added bonus is the water-resistant outer covering fabric. I do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Meadows

customer_reviews.title: The 15-15.4" fits a Thinkpad X1 Extreme/P1 perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I was researching sleeves and came across this case and on a hunch bought the 15-15.4" sleeve instead of the 15.6" (which would be too big). The case fits my laptop perfectly and it seems to be well made and offers ample protection. I'm looking forward to using this case more, and even on trips when I travel. Hopefully it lasts a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15.6" MSI GS65 Stealth Thin gaming laptop. The fit is near perfect with just a tiny space width wise. The laptop does not slide at all though. The zippered pouch has enough room to fit its battery pack without feeling too tight. Materials feel very nice, especially the inside which also features protective material around the zippers so they don't scratch your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sleeve to hold my Mac and the pocket on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleeve to hold my Mac and the pocket on top comes in very handy! I only had an issue because I (stupidly) didn't look inside the sleeve before I started using it and putting my computer inside. A few weeks after use, I started noticing little plastic balls coming out when I pulled my computer out of the sleeve, and a few were getting into small crevices of my computer. I realized that I didn't remove the silica packet and it had broken inside the sleeve. I've since cleaned it out and everything is working well. So I definitely suggest buying this sleeve, just make sure you remove the silica packet!
customer_reviews.author: AuntieS

customer_reviews.title: Fits Unibody (non-Retina) MacBooks very well!  A1286
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove! I double-checked the measurements and my 2012 MacBook Pro is only 0.2" thicker than the Retina model this is designed for (I selected "15-15.4" as the size, not the 2016-2017!!). This should fit all 15" unibody MacBooks, A1286 non-Retina and A1398 Retina, from 2008-2015! I received a fancy leather bag with no padding as a gift and use this inside for peace of mind/protection. The bag has two decent size compartments; I'm not talking about a slim laptop compartment. The sleeve is not 'bulky', but certainly not slim either. Measures 1.5" with my non-retina MacBook Pro in it.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Very padded protective case for my laptop! Perfect for someone who requires a lot of transportation.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had such a great laptop case/bag in my life. This design is not only very sleek and minimal but also does its job in cushioning and protecting my laptop. I saw a review about a guy who got into some vehicle accident and his laptop survived the crash after using this laptop bag and I knew I needed to get this! Though I have not taken this out and about yet (and do not plan on test dropping my laptop), I feel a lot more comfortable and confident in going out and traveling with this in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but stained 😫
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a slim, protective & affordable case for my Dell Inspiron Chromebook 14 7486 (approx 13" x 9" .66) and this Tomtoc was close enough. The quality of the case is great, the 2 bottom corners are reinforced, the zippers are nice, and the removable strip of padding at the bottom stays in place with strong Velcro. 4 stars because there is a permanent & noticable small stain inside the case which is very disappointing. Especially since I need the case now & can't go without it while waiting for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RebelEclectic

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2019 16 inch Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the feel of the material or my color options, but overall it will do what I need it to. Inside is nice in comparison, soft, and seems like it will keep my MBP protected from minor drops and scratches. Pouch in front can hold the cable and power brick with a few more cables/adapters but bulges a little. Likely wouldn't hold one of the larger chargers. Happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: amazondre

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Macbook + Fits in backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was carrying my laptop in to work in a sloppy way with a few other items. The computer fell corner-first and hit the concrete hard. Thankfully, my computer was in this sleeve. The bag actually got messed up from the fall (zipper area got a little torn up) but this ended up meaning that my laptop was not harmed at all. The sleeve took the hit. Super happy. Just need to buy a new sleeve now, easy decision. Side note, this sleeve fits perfectly in a slot in my backpack meant for laptops. Double the protection when I have my backpack on me.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Tomtoc!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop sleeve came in just as it was described, I purchased the grey. It fits my 15" MacBook Pro with Touchbar like a glove; since the newer MacBooks are thinner I left the cushion spacer attached at the bottom of the laptop sleeve and my laptop does not slide around. I feel confident this would protect my laptop as well. The zippers are functional, they don't catch on anything and don't feel cheap. I also love the pocket on the outside--I use it to store my adapter for the newer MacBooks and it's perfect, not bulky. I would definitely recommend this sleeve to anyone in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely happy with this case. Everyone knows higher computers are delicate physically, and i always have a fear of mine getting broken in my backpack or something, but this definitely puts my mind at ease. Super soft interior, padded edges, and has a front pouch to put your charger or whatever; plus the padding is between that pocket and the computer. I really don't have anything bad to say about
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Razer Blade 15
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Razer Blade 15 and it fits perfectly. The cushion around the border does an amazing job of protecting it from bumps, I feel comfortable throwing it in my backpack and I don't worry about it if it bumps into walls or if I'm a bit rough when placing it down. The cushion also does a great job of protecting it from the zipper when removing/inserting it from the case so I don't have to worry about it getting scratched
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Macbook Pro case
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this case. The outside is well built and the soft interior makes me feel comfortable placing my laptop in it. I wouldn't want to drop my laptop in any circumstance but I would feel much more comfortable knowing I'd have dropped it with this case on than without. Overall would highly recommend for a basic case. No need for it to be much more complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit 2013 Mac Book Pro snugly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two reasons: One, to slip into my old laptop bag (which was designed around bulky 2009-era laptops) to prevent the MBP from jostling around, and Two, to use to transport my MBP in a smaller manner than my full-sized laptop bag. Suffice to say, it fits in perfectly into my older laptop bag, and the Mac Book Pro fits in snugly with no wobbling. Definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: HighlordFox

customer_reviews.title: Little extra cushin' for the Mac pushin'
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward soft case. Has nice bubble padding on the inside for that extra care. The complaints about things not fitting are rampant in case reviews. 15 inch late 2018 Macbook pro model, with hardshell case on fits in with some wiggle room to spare. Now I would normally be upset at the bit of extra room but when you throw in the power supply, 4 or 5 cables, a smaller external hard drive... things can get bulky looking or just not fit right. This case allows for all of that to happy without any drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: daniel derubis sr.

customer_reviews.title: The only downside is the case's weight and bulk
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older and roughly-comparable laptop case which began to disintegrate. As far as I can tell, that one and this provide comparable protection. But this one weighs more, and has a not-useful-to-me outside pocket. It's also bulkier (due to more padding?) but the padding is "sculpted", which makes me think that despite the extra padding, it won't provide better protection than its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: David M Bristor

customer_reviews.title: 15” MacBook did not fit very well
customer_reviews.text: I took off 2 stars because this item was actually too small to comfortably hold a 15” 2017 MacBook Pro. However, it was large enough that if you pulled the top corners tight, the Mac would just barely go inside. It’s just really tight at the corners. For full disclosure, we do have a very slim fit case on the Mac, however, doesn’t everybody? If this case were 3/8” taller it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: I am in LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking and looking for the perfect sleeve and this is it! I keep my macbook pro in the sleeve unless I am using it. I also use it as a lap pillow for my laptop to sit on while I'm using it. The color is perfect and it's very durable. I love it!! Fits my macbook pro 15" like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, nice quality inside and out.
customer_reviews.text: I like this case a lot, the outside is high quality and the inside is very soft. I wish the corners were a little more protected by rubber pieces around the entire thing but it has a zipper so I’m not sure if it’s worth doing so. The pocket could be a little bigger since the new MacBooks have usb C only and you have to carry around a lot of accessories for stupid thing. Compact and high quality. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dario O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little tight fitting.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it's very difficult to find a good protective travel case for the MacBook Pro. The newest versions of the MacBook Pro has keyboard issues causing keys to still that seem to happen while traveling so I needed a protective travel case with a good border cushion. This one is the only one I found that had any cushion around the outside edge at all. It works but fits a little too snugly making it difficult to zip up. It also has no strap. But for now it will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Taz-ManianWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great case for MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.text: When I put my laptop in this case, my worries about it being damaged in transport are immediately dissolved. This is a case that is easily worth twice its list price - I'm sure you'd much rather buy a $30 case now than buy another $2000 computer after one unprotected slip-up! The only complaint I can muster is that the dimple pattern of the inside fabric tends to leave non-permanent marks/spots on the aluminum surface of the computer that can be wiped away. A small annoyance, if anything.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Great edge protection
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of this type of sleeve because it allows me to use any kind of bag to carry my MacBook, not just ones with built in padding for a laptop. Frankly, I think this sleeve offers more protection than most bags with built in padding. The edge protection is great. I know my MacBook is safe even if I'm a little rough when I plop my bag down or toss it in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: William V. Derr

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2018 15 inch MacBook Pro perfectly. Seems to protect it well too. I took a turn too fast and it slid off my car seat and on to the floor. Two things of note: it is bulky, so if you want to put it in a tote or backpack, it may not work. Also, it doesn’t have a handle (which I knew it would not from the description). After using it for a while, I wish it did, but it’s not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great carry case.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great low cost sleeve for your laptop. Not much to really say about it. I didn't give it a 5 star overall rating because it's not as handsome in person as the photos would have you believe. It's slightly oblong in some areas but it's really me nitpicking. I would purchase it again, but it's just not as "perfect" and crisp as it looks in the photos. Great carry case overall.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: This thin case is great. The outer fabric is strong and scuff resistant while the padding is dense and provides true protection. YKK zippers are a bonus too. It fits both of my 15.6" laptops perfectly: Acer 15.6" Chomebook, and Lenovo T510 15.6" with extended battery. I could not be happier with this purchase. I've since bought two other Tomtoc items and will ask my boss to buy a case for my work Laptop.
customer_reviews.author: 4estGimp

customer_reviews.title: I love this case so much!
customer_reviews.text: This case is absolutely awesome! The quality is outstanding. It is really well made and the inside is perfect to protect the MacBook Pro 16". It fits perfect and well exceeded my expectations for what I was going to get based on the price. This is money well spent. You will be really happy with this case. I chose the black and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie E. Page

customer_reviews.title: Good Case overall, fit could be a tiny bit looser IMO
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this case. I use it for carrying my 16 inch MacBook Pro when traveling. It’s super sturdy and has protected my laptop some rough situations. Only complaint is that it is just a little too tight, I sometimes worry that the zipper might scratch the laptop but that hasn’t happened yet. All in all would recommend - but please make it just a tiny bit larger .
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Sleeve.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new MBP 16” and it works great! Super plush protection and doesn’t let the computer slide around inside, it’s holds it in place. The pocket is a fair sized, it hold the charger, my Magic Mouse 2 and my anker USB-C hub perfectly. Great cover, great protection and looks great. I much prefer this to my incase one for my MBP 15” Retina Display. And it’s more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: JUST too small for 15 inch MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this case, as it's well-made and has many features that even $50 or $60 cases don't seem to have, especially a doubly-reinforced buffer between the metal of the zipper and the computer. Unfortunately, the case is several millimeters too small to fit my 2018 MacBook Pro. The case closes, but the computer does not fit comfortably into the padded space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protective!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I have been using it for a few months now. My husband has one too. I never planned on testing out the water resistance feature, but I got to a few weeks ago. A water bottle opened in my backpack while I was driving to work (for 2 hours....). My backpack was full of water and my laptop was completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Innerst

customer_reviews.title: Very very thick sleeve
customer_reviews.text: These are probably one of the thickest one I have ever owned. It is cushioned all around so I have no doubt that it will protect the laptop really well. But the thing is... it is kinda THICK! Unless you have a lot of space for this, you're gonna find this a little bit space consuming. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Wong

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra padding for my new MacBook Pro in my laptop bag. This slides right into my bag and hugs the laptop. For the price I was surprised by the quality and durability of the product. Since I just have the sleeve inside my laptop bag, I just left the extra foam that came tucked into the front pocket there and i feel like that adds even more protection. I’ve been using this every day since May and it’s holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: sylvo

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sleeve and another brand to protect my laptop in my backpack. This one is hands down far superior in protection. It is everything it claims to be. The padding is thick, plush, and bountiful. The sleeve also has a slight rigidness to it which is a double bonus in the protection department. I am confident that it is protecting my MacBook to the fullest with its snug fit and padded lip all the way around. If I have decide to get a laptop case, this is the brand I will use.
customer_reviews.author: Gentry

customer_reviews.title: HP ENVY x360 Laptop - 15 (2020)
customer_reviews.text: I scoured the internet trying to find a protective sleeve that would work for my brand new HP Envy x360 15 inch 2-in-1 laptop. Even though the screen diagonal measures 15.6, the narrower screen bezel means a significantly smaller physical frame than older models. The 2020 model measures 14.09 x 9.06in & 0.74in in height. I chose the "15 Inch for MacBook Pro" TomToc based on the dimensions listed. The corners on the HP are more square than the macbook, so you have to manipulate the shoulders of the internal padding a little the first few times you use it, but it fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Trent R

customer_reviews.title: 16" Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: It fits the 16 inch Macbook Pro snugly. Its nice.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for my MBP
customer_reviews.text: This case is excellent! It feels strong and durable, yet it is light and easy to transport. It fits perfectly in my backpack and my laptop it's well protected. And with the front zipper I can put there my most used peripherals such as the USB-C/A adapters, Ethernet adapter, HDMI adapter and my charging cables. It's a good looking, well protecting sleeve. Highly recommended not only for MBP users, but any laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. It's a perfect fit for my 15" Macbook Pro w/Retina (2012). I especially like that the padding is substantial enough to protect the corners from bumps during transport. About the only negative I can give it is that the front pocket is really only appropriate for papers. It's such a nice snug fit that I worry about putting my power brick inside the pocket as it would press against the top or bottom of the macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Me, Myself & I

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeve
customer_reviews.text: It fits the 15-inch 2016 MacBook Pro with touchbar perfectly. The inner lining is very soft and scratch resistant and very well padded. You can cram your charger, mouse, and cable into the side pocket, but I don't like how it looks. I feel that it stretches the fabric too much. I personally prefer to use a separate pouch for accessories, cables, and dongles. It keeps things better organized.
customer_reviews.author: MartinO

customer_reviews.title: Nice slim case
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2017 15" MacBook Pro. The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 is the corner protection is only on the bottom two corners. The pocket on the front is great for the charger, cable and my USB/HDMI/USB-C > USB-C adapter. Have had for a couple of months and appears to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this sleeve. It's half the price of sleeves in the computer store and much more protection. Nice that the padding keeps the zipper from rubbing on the laptop. Fits he 2018 MacBook Pro perfectly. For my own purposes, there is too much padding, because I want to carry my MBP in this sleeve, and then in my briefcase. The generous padding on this sleeve makes it too large for my briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit and bulky, but protective
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 15 inch MacBook Pro, and I got the correct size according to the model number but it’s a bit of a loose fit which I don’t love but I’m not mad at it. I like that is has a pocket where I could put my charger. It is a bulky sleeve, but I wanted something protective and I think this does the trick. I haven’t had it for too long so I can’t say much about long term durability or anything like that though. I took a star off for the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Good case. Feels solid and firm.
customer_reviews.text: Nice! It was a little bigger than I expected, but that's probably a good thing. It has a very stiff feel to it and I feel like my laptop is well-protected by it. I haven't been using it very long, but it makes me feel more secure when traveling with my computer. I especially appreciate the extra protection in the corners and around the sides; I spent weeks on Amazon looking for a case that would offer protection around the edges of the laptop, which feels like the most likely place for the computer to land.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice padding!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case in late 2018 for my new MacBook Pro 15" and the laptop just fits, and is snug when in the case so it doesn't flop around at all. I pretty much love everything about the case from material, to the extra padding, to the zipper handles, to the fact that the extra storage pouch also has a zipper to protect stuff from falling out. So far I've had no problems with the case.
customer_reviews.author: thegoddess

customer_reviews.title: Poofy
customer_reviews.text: Fits my ThinkPad X1 Extreme perfectly, and I love the edge protection. I wouldn't dare keep my charger in that front pocket though since that puts a bad pressure point against the screen. It's good for papers you need to keep handy though. I would've appreciated some sheets of plastic sewn under the fabric on each side to help disperse sharp knocks over more cushioning area. Its a quality thing though, and the orange accents match my camera sling which is cool :)
customer_reviews.author: Poznos

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Given a few reviews, with pictures, detailing issues experienced for this particular sleeve, I was slightly hesitant to purchase. So glad I listened to my internal compass; great purchase and protects my laptop from bumps, dings and scratches. Full disclosure, my laptop is also encased in the "MacBook Pro 15 Case 2018 2017 2016 Release A1990/A1707, ProCase Hard Case Shell Cover and Keyboard Cover for Apple MacBook Pro 15" (2018/2017/2016) with Touch Bar and Touch ID -Rainbow1"
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 16” MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I love the zippered pocket for the charger and other accessories. I was always forgetting something but now it’s always together. It’s well padded and super easy to access the machine. I highly recommend this case. I’ve not tested it for water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my new macbook, same as shown in picture, nice canvas fabric outside and soft inside that protect your device. high quality zipper, light weight. great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful present!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted the case to my father-in-law two years ago and did he love it! He's been using it every day for two years, and I can surely tell that this product is of high quality, VERY durable and resistant to liquids. It has not changed it's shape or color after the two-year-long run that included constant travels and exposures to different weathers. It's got many more years of use to come. It has a perfect pocket for the little cords and chargers you may want to carry with you. My father-in-law keeps saying that the case was the best gift he has received in many years.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one of these for my Mac Laptop and I will never not use it! It protects my laptop perfectly and gives amazing cushion! It's a very nice looking case, sleek and not too bulky. I absolutely love this sleeve - it has saved my computer in a couple of cases. The outer sleeve is a great pocket for pens/charger cord, papers.
customer_reviews.author: Kat C.

customer_reviews.title: Great case - works for iPad
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my iPad Pro 12”, which fits in this case really well. I also have a MacBook Pro which fits in the case, but I use my iPad professionally every day and this case has held up and protected it for over a year. The cushioning covers every inch inside the case, and the corners are reinforced. Zipper is still in great shape. Outside pocket holds a few papers or could hold a cord, but I probably wouldn’t put the plug in it as it would stick out and possibly put pressure through the case. The nature design is really cute. Haven’t spilled anything on it so I can’t speak for it’s water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: The color is true to the photo, which is nice. The material for the laptop case is very sturdy and it really protects my laptop. I haven't spilled anything on it so I can't say much about how water repellent it is, but so far I'm very impressed by this laptop case, I'm honestly surprised it's not more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: N. Yao

customer_reviews.title: Solid but sleek case!
customer_reviews.text: I love the zipper pocket to store the charger and usb adapter. The case is sleek enough that I can throw it in a backpack or other bag but solid enough that I don't need to worry about the safety of my laptop if it gets jostled a bit. I feel so much more comfortable traveling with my laptop protected in this bag! The inside is super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great 15.6" case for 17" LG Gram
customer_reviews.text: This case is very nice. Padding is perfect. Outer material feels nice and tough. My 17" gram pops perfectly into the wrapped corners with no room to bounce around. However, I am not comfortable putting the stock power cable in the outer pocket for fear of squishing the laptop, but the pouch fits letter sized paper perfectly. Pocket would also be great for other narrow items like a usb cable, wallet, tablet, phone or thin book.
customer_reviews.author: Miltonia

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeves I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for my 15" 2019 MacBook Pro and another one for my 2017 MacBook. They both fit the laptop perfectly, and clearly have great protection, including solid edge protection. They're well-made and look nice. You'll feel confident the first time you put your laptop in. Yes, the total package is a bit thicker than some other sleeves - that's the trade-off for the additional protection.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Mcnerney

customer_reviews.title: Such a great sleeve case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeve! Made from high quality materials Its is very protective and have a nice soft texture around the inside edges It is water resistant so I don't need to worry about accidentally spill anything on it while my laptop is inside. The secondary compartment is big enough so store an ipad, few documents, the a.c charger and you'll left with a spare room! The zippers are also nice and sturdy. The only downside is that it is a little bit bulky, not so much but if you want a sleem sleeve go for other product, this one add protection but adding a little bit of bulkiness. Fits my dell xps 15 9560 perfectly
customer_reviews.author: MAOR

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a friend's Macbook Pro (2015 model). The case fit well, snug, but not quite as tight as I would have thought. The padding felt of a good quality and the zipper pocket was of good size. I liked it enough to be considering purchasing the same sleeve (smaller size) for my Macbook Air. My friend and I also looked at sleeves in major electronics chain store and I believe that, for the price, the quality of this case is much better than what they sold there for twice the price. I could have stood to see a little more padding around the edges perhaps, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Quinley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for Aero 15, despite overly generous internal dimensions stated.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a Gigabyte Aero 15 and the fit is absolutely perfect. The internal dimensions given made me believe there would be some gaps when storing the laptop. It was still the best fit for the Aero so I tried it out. Glad I did. It fits snug. No extra space with the thick padding around the sides which is a nice touch. The reinforced bumpers are also a nice feature. I wish they put some smaller bumpers on the zipper side but understand the lack of feasibility for that. The extra pouch fits the cable and power brick for the Aero perfectly, but trying to squeeze a full sized mouse with that is a bit much.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Chance

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a new laptop sleeve. My old one was about 9 years old or so, and it was falling apart. I really like that this case has padded edges, because usually my laptop is on a side in my bags. It seems really supportive and the extra pocket is great. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: but it seems very good. The padding seems very protective
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet taken this laptop sleeve on the road, but it seems very good. The padding seems very protective, yet the sleeve is lightweight. It fits my late 2016 vintage 15" macbook pro perfectly, and the price on Amazon was reasonable. I can definitely say that this sleeve is superior to the limited and overpriced options I saw in the Apple store.
customer_reviews.author: aproductofsociety

customer_reviews.title: Soft Interior, Strong Exterior
customer_reviews.text: the interior is heavenly soft, perfect size, almost no wiggle room at all, which is perfect! the exterior is pretty sturdy, the extra pocket is good for carrying accessories, i have a cord, charger, and a USB-C hub and an USB-C stick in there! very happy, 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: matt ding

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and gentle on the inside and insulating on the outside to protect your stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have two MacBook Pro 15's. One for work and one for play. I have two TomToc 15 360's.... diff colors to help me know which is which.... they are very durable and I travel the world with them. Water resist tops and super plus insides which prevent the nice metal / aluminum chassis of fancier laptops from getting scratched. I even have their smaller iPad sleeves too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RM4Amazon

customer_reviews.title: 15" MacBook Pro w/Touch Bar fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I have the newest (2017) 15" MacBook Pro with Touch Bar, kept in this shell case:  The computer (in its case) fits perfectly in this sleeve, even with the removable strip of padding left in. The styling is just like what's in the picture. I haven't had a chance to put it through its paces yet, but the zipper seems sturdy, too. (I find the zippers on previous sleeves I've owned eventually cause problems.) I'd like the outer pocket to bulge out a little bit to hold more, but really I think most people would say that would spoil the point of the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This laptop sleeve is heavily padded with very soft half spheres that cover the inner surface. The material is very similar to a firm memory foam. The outside of the sleeve looks great in person. It as a very modern look. I purchased this sleeve for my new razer blade 15 and the 15.6 inch sleeve was too large. If you have a razer blade I would try the 15 inch that is a perfect fit for the macbook pro.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: 16inch version fits 2015 Macbook Pro 15 perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a sleeve for my 2015 MBP and this was one of the few that has the additional border of cushion support, so picked up the 16inch MBP version and it fits perfect. Its snug but not TOO tight, but not loose either. Had the same brand for my wifes smaller MBP and was not disappointed, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Fits my new 2017 MacBook Pro w/ Touchbar P-E-R-F-E-C-T-L-Y!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new 15" MacBook Pro with Touchbar yesterday and this case fits it perfect! I left the bottom soft protection in and after a few uses and stretches to accommodate corners of the MacBook it fits like a glove! Recommended for a tight, protected fit. It's slightly bulky but not bad at all. It will protect my MacBook effectively if I bring it out of the house without the zippers scratching it. You can't ask for anything more than that!
customer_reviews.author: whysoblu

customer_reviews.title: Durability and great protection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for almost a year and have had no worries about anything happening to my macbook while it’s in my backpack, because there’s so much padding inside of the case. It even seems like the case has helped protect the device from extreme temperatures, in that whenever I’ve left it baking in the trunk of my car during Florida’s hot summers (I know, I know—that’s not good for laptops), even though the outside of the case has been hot, the computer and inside of the case have felt a little bit warm, if not normal. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband's new 2016 MacPro Touch 15 inch laptop. It's a bit large (even though Tomtoc suggested this one for another customer as noted in the reviews) yet lining is very protective. We kept it because of the outer zipper compartment that allows room for charger and iPad. If you have a !5 inch PC laptop, then it will fit perfectly. The water resistant material on the outside is another huge plus. Would like to suggest Tomtoc to make this same model with a handle and it would be perfect. I've seen the other ones with a handle and they seem to be very big.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not too bulky but with a good amount of protection. It has good zippers and works for casual and professional settings. Pocket fits a laptop charger nicely. I use it in and out of a backpack so it's pretty easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: MacBook 15" Pro Case
customer_reviews.text: Had been shopping for a case for my new computer for over two years now and don't know what took me so long to decide. Obviously with the TomToc which was available 2 years ago I was hesitant, but now that I have it I love it. Great case for my 1 TB $4000 computer.
customer_reviews.author: pniemeier

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop case
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case is very nicely sewn and padded to protect my son's laptop. He just received this case and will be taking off to college in the fall. So I do not know how long it lasts. Hopefully a long time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: collin

customer_reviews.title: 15 Inch case is good fit for Acer Chromebook 14, great padding and feels good!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Acer Chromebook 14 with a *little* slop, but only by like 1/4". That doesn't really matter that much, tho, because it's so well padded that a little movement won't damage anything. Only thing that would improve it would be if it had a handle of some sort and the storage pocket is a little tight. I have a small charger and a portable mouse that folds flat, but if you carry a full size mouse or external HDD, it might not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best 15in Macbook case!
customer_reviews.text: I was simply looking for a 15in MacBook Pro case that could arrive same-day as I ordered it. I was so surpized when I opened it to find it had a velvet type lining in the case. It also has a nice pocket on the outside for a charger or usb cords. I would defiantly order this again and recommend it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bret Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, just buy :)
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the case is very protective and has ample room for a 14-inch laptop. The outside of the case looks great and feels very comfortable while handling the laptop on the go. I would highly recommend this product. It has got room on the front to keep stylus pen or Mouse
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Gaikwad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dell 15 9500 2020
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my dell 15 9500 2020 and it fits perfectly. lots of protection on all parts of laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jeroweezy

customer_reviews.title: Fits Lenovo Y740
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why there is an F rating on Fakespot but it came in today and I do not see any defects so far. Stitching looks consistent. The rubber pads in the corners are present only on the non zipper side of case. I would not trust the rubber protection over a foot impact. I would say its a good case to supplement when carrying in a bag so it would not get scuffed up
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does, without compromising.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, secure and water resistant. A great pouch for your expensive investment. I don't leave home without my laptop in this. Considering the MacBook uses the aluminum casing to help dissipate heat, normal cases just hinder this. So naked it is. And with this pouch, If I am hiking and get caught in a rainstorm with this in my ruck, I know it will be safe. Thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Daken

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeve, Wish They Had More Material Choices
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I wish they offered different/better fabrics though. Something more modern and wipeable. The gray cloth looks and feels like it will stain easily over time. Other than that, a really great sleeve for a 15" Retina MacBook Pro from 2016/2017. Love the interior padding and protection. The zipped pouch on the front is a very nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Darko

customer_reviews.title: The extra pocket is perfect wish they had different prints but the gray is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, the exact same color on the picture. The extra pocket is perfect wish they had different prints but the gray is just fine. Im not sure about the other reviews but I have the 15" MacBook Pro latest model with touchbar and I have a case on it not thick at all but it fits perfectly inside. The front pocket could fit a journal to take notes, YOOBI COLLEGE Ruled size, fits it pretty snug but just to give you an idea. I love it. Macbook dimesions Height: 0.61 inch (1.55 cm) Width: 13.75 inches (34.93 cm) Depth: 9.48 inches (24.07 cm) Weight: 4.02 pounds (1.83 kg)3 fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Magggg

customer_reviews.title: Very well padded!
customer_reviews.text: Very well padded! I bought one of these for an older computer I had in love that! It’s really durable based on the old one I had so I assume this will be the same. Really enjoy the extra padding inside and it’s built nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Survived Flying Into Traffic
customer_reviews.text: I left my MacBook (main pocket) and my iPad (front pocket) in this case on top of my Civic and forgot and drove off. It stayed on my car through two turns and flew off into an intersection at the third turn, unbeknownst to me. I noticed it was missing from my car and whipped around to retrace my "steps" and saw it in the intersection. I threw my car into park and grabbed it, saving it from a car. Everything was perfectly okay!!!!!! My MacBook has some VERY minor cosmetic damage and the zipper broke on the case but it definitely saved my items. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Baxter

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sleeve. I was looking for something that would protect against a little more than scratches, and since this has quite a bit of padding around the edges, it is exactly what I was looking for. Even though the case seems to have originally been made for the non-touch bar retina MacBook Pro 15, there is a filler that they add to the inside of the case that makes this fit well. Definitely more bulky than the thin stretchy sleeves I have seen more commonly used, but I like the extra protection. The outside is made of a canvas-like material, and has a nice pocket that can fit an iPad, pens, a charger, or whatever else.
customer_reviews.author: Austin C.

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: the laptop sleeve was really good to begin with but i’ve only had it for 5 months and the zippers don’t zip anymore. they’re not caught on anything or broken, they just won’t zip up. i don’t use the sleeve daily and i only use it during class. pretty bummed that it barely lasted only 5 months!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Bui

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has a generous amount of cushioning to protect your laptop. The material feels great and doesn't get dirty easily. Zips easily. I love that it has an extra pocket to store my flash drive, charger for my laptop and other small things. The only downside is that it doesn't have a handle so you have to carry it with both your hands or really well with one. Other than that great!! Love it and would recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: The case is great. Well worth the cost. I was debating getting a cheaper case, but I’m glad I chose this one instead. The cushioning on the sides and edges of the case make it super protective, and are the main reason why I’m glad I got it. Also after seeing the review about the MacBook that survived the motorcycle crash with this case. Definitely fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago M.

customer_reviews.title: So flimsy...it's just an expensive cover to protect the finish, not the machine.
customer_reviews.text: So flimsy...it's just an expensive cover to protect the finish, not the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Daemon

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product; computer defnitely feels protected
customer_reviews.text: The product has excellent padding/protection for my MacBook Pro. It also has a nice pocket for a charger and other small accessories (e.g., mouse). I recommend this to anyone looking who is looking for hefty protection for their MacBook Pro; if you want something thin/basic, this is product may not be right for you.
customer_reviews.author: AA

product_meta.title: tomtoc 360 Protective Laptop Sleeve for 16-inch New MacBook Pro 2019, 15-inch Old MacBook Pro Retina 2012-2015, Surface Book 2 15 Inch, Ultrabook Notebook Bag Case with Accessory Pocket
feature_bullets: CornerArmor Patent: Compared with other similar laptop sleeve, tomtoc sleeve comes with original CornerArmor patent design at the bottom protects your device from drops and bumps, like the car airbag
360° Protection: Thick internal plush lining cushioning provides shock absorption; 360° protective padding around the zipper prevents potential scratches
Durable & Compact: Specially made with YKK zipper for secure and long-lasting usage; Compact design, easy to carry alone or fit inside another Messenger Bag or backpack
Accessory Pocket: Comes with a front pocket for accessories, such as iPad, charger, cable, smartphone, etc.

Custom Made for Perfect Fit: Internal Dimensions - 14.13" x 9.73" x 0.71", Designed for 16-inch New MacBook Pro 2019 | 15-inch Old MacBook Pro Retina 2012-2015 (A1398); Also fit: 15 inch Microsoft Surface Book 2 | ThinkPad X1 Extreme Gen 2 (15”) Bullet Point

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,347 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
